Title: Docker & local dev

Title: CI/CD pipeline
Body: GitHub Actions build/test FE & BE, lint, build Docker image.

Title: Reviews (sau buổi học)

Title: My schedule (Student/Tutor)
Body: FE calendar view lịch học.

Title: Chat moderation hooks
Body: Profanity filter, báo cáo tin nhắn.

Title: Web push (optional)

Title: Report/complaint API
Body: API báo cáo nội dung, gắn booking/chat.

Body: Queues: KYC approvals, content reports.

Body: UI hàng đợi moderation.

Body: CRUD subjects; promo codes.

Body: Sự kiện search→view→booking→complete.

Body: Pytest unit/integration; coverage.

Body: k6/JMeter cho search, booking, chat.

Body: Môi trường staging, dữ liệu demo.

Body: Privacy policy, ToS, cookie banner, backup, DR plan.
